Module WitchHunt
Package fr.sos.witchhunt.model.players.cpustrategies

Class CardValue

java.lang.Object
fr.sos.witchhunt.model.players.cpustrategies.CardValue
public final class CardValue extends Object

This class represents the value attributed to a Rumour card by a SINGLE CPU Player's strategy.

An instance of CardValue is compound of plural integer values : its Witch effect's value, its Hunt effect's value, its additional value, and of plural booleans categorizing the card (risked, offensive, decisive ...).

It is dynamically and regularly updated by a CPU Player's strategy, which associates to each existing Rumour card a value thanks to its CardValueMap.

This value helps each CPU players to choose their actions as well as the cards to steal, discard or play, based on their chosen strategy.

It can be locked to prevent modification, so it is updated only the first time a particular situation is met.

Each Rumour card has a default value, which can be modified using a parameterized constructor and by modifying fields directly in the card's constructor. A card's default value, associated with its class, is given by RumourCard::getDefaultValue(). When instanciated,

See Also:
  • RumourCard
  • CardValueMap
  • CPUStrategy::updateBehavior(boolean,Identity,RumourCardsPile)
  • CPUPlayer
  • PlayStrategy

  • Field Details

    • witchValue

      private int witchValue
      Integer value attributed by a CPU player to a Rumour card's witch effect.
      See Also:
      • RumourCard
      • WitchEffect

    • huntValue

      private int huntValue
      Integer value attributed by a CPU player to a Rumour card's hunt effect.
      See Also:
      • RumourCard
      • HuntEffect

    • additionalValue

      private int additionalValue

      Integer value attributed by a CPU player to a Rumour card's additional value.

      Cards like Broomstick have an additional value as they grant immunity against another Rumour card.

      Most cards don't have, by default, an additional value.

      See Also:
      • RumourCard
      • Broomstick
      • RumourCard::grantsImmunityAgainst(RumourCard)

    • protects

      private boolean protects

      This boolean field is true for Rumour cards which grant a protection against others.

      Cards like Broomstick have an additional value as they grant immunity against another Rumour card.

      See Also:
      • RumourCard
      • Broomstick
      • RumourCard::grantsImmunityAgainst(RumourCard)

    • isDecisive

      private boolean isDecisive

      This boolean field is true for Rumour cards that become decisive from the point of view of a CPU player.

      For example, Evil Eye becomes decisive for all CPU strategies when the average unrevealed cards number is low.

      See Also:
      • Evil Eye
      • CPUStrategy::updateBehavior(boolean,Identity,RumourCardsPile)

    • isRisked

      private boolean isRisked

      This boolean field is true for a Rumour Card that is considered as risked by a CPU player.

      For example, Toad is initially considered as risked - and looses this characteristic in very particuliar situations.

      A risked card has very low chances of being played by a Defensive strategy and by witches in general.

      See Also:
      • Toad
      • DefensiveStrategy
      • CPUStrategy::updateBehavior(boolean,Identity,RumourCardsPile)

    • isOffensive

      private boolean isOffensive

      This boolean field is true for a Rumour Card that has an offensive effect.

      For example, the Ducking Stool is considered as an offensive Rumour Card.

      An offensive RumourCard is likely to be valued by an offensive strategy.

      See Also:
      • DuckingStool
      • OffensiveStrategy

    • givesCards

      private boolean givesCards

      This boolean field is true for a Rumour Card, the effects of which allow to take other Rumour cards.

      For example, HookedNose potentially gives cards.

      Defensive strategy grant a high value to this kind of cards.

      See Also:
      • HookedNose

    • locked

      private boolean locked

      Once this field is set to true, no field in this class can be modified excepted this one.

      See Also:
      • setHuntValue(int)
      • setWitchValue(int)
      • lock()
      • unlock()
      • CPUStrategy::updateBehavior(boolean,Identity,RumourCardsPile)
